Title: Theme Override Orchard module
Description: This Orchard module adds configuration to the admin page that lets override the styling of the current theme (works with tenants too).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This Orchard module adds configuration to the admin page that lets override the styling of the current theme (works with tenants too).

This repository has moved to GitHub. Please visit the new repository at https://github.com/Lombiq/Orchard-Theme-Override.

The CodePlex page is not maintained anymore, but still here for historical reference.

Features:
  • Adds a configuration to Themes settings to specify styles that can override the theme's
  • Works in a multi-tenant environment too, so you can provide tenants customization for their theme

Commercial-grade support for this module is available through Lombiq Technologies.

The module is also available for DotNest sites.

You can install the module from the Gallery.
